608371859072163845.text: @NesmithChris honestly - not really, because at the end of the day, it's just stuff I listen to while driving
608371859072163845.name: fwong

608365501136424961.text: @NesmithChris I would argue that race and gender is a much more integral part of people's identities than hobbies eg
608365501136424961.name: fwong

608365383159054338.text: @NesmithChris I compare it to hip hop. I love hip hop. It's also crazy sexist. But I really don't feel attacked when people say that.
608365383159054338.name: fwong

608362328841699328.text: @NesmithChris I think it really comes down to people tying a lot of their personal identity to their hobbies, which doesn't make sense to me
608362328841699328.name: fwong

608362091611877376.text: @NesmithChris what I've seen is a lot of people taking statements about the industry as a whole as personal attacks when it really isn't
608362091611877376.name: fwong

608361515486486528.text: @NesmithChris nobody thinks that. The discussion is that the industry doesn't seem to take that into consideration.
608361515486486528.name: fwong

608361308115902465.text: @NesmithChris Doesn't the fact that there are those who do feel strongly make you stop and think "maybe this is important for those people?"
608361308115902465.name: fwong

608360976434515968.text: @NesmithChris The point is 60% of HS girls preferred playing as girls. They might play regardless, but it means it's against their pref.
608360976434515968.name: fwong

608350261590020096.text: @NesmithChris definitely not that way for long http://t.co/zN7fhaqB3e
608350261590020096.name: fwong

608338617400991746.text: @NesmithChris and I'd much rather live in a world where we are all more empathetic with each other. If that's "hypersensitive," so be it
608338617400991746.name: fwong

608337794973487104.text: @NesmithChris i guess I don't mind criticism and debate especially when the game is making millions
608337794973487104.name: fwong

608291107206656000.text: @NesmithChris I guess I really don't see that anywhere, above and beyond the usual critical noise floor
608291107206656000.name: fwong

608156371171745794.text: @NesmithChris I think the definition of empathy is attempting to understand other people's viewpoints regardless of my own personal feelings
608156371171745794.name: fwong

608142178292858881.text: @NesmithChris luckily I think we are in a time where every creative decision need not bow to the demands of sheer profitability.
608142178292858881.name: fwong

608054866066468864.text: @Bizz408 @srhbutts  the issue isn't "are people actively preventing this from happening." Of course not.

525543660067123200.text: "Not All The GamerGate's Men" (2015) Two Twitter users uncover the GamerGate scandal, leading to a bunch of gaming blog editors resigning.
525543660067123200.name: fwong

525542091091234817.text: @TheBrandonMorse I don't think you're an awful person - I think you really do believe in something and are fighting for it.
525542091091234817.name: fwong

525540715351138304.text: "When an Activision PR rep pawns PAX party passes off to a bunch of editors, I'll be there, rooting out this corruption one blog at a time."
525540715351138304.name: fwong

525539579030298624.text: "This is a 1up article," He slides the paper over: "THIS is an EA press release." The cig falls from his lips. "My god... they're the same!"
525539579030298624.name: fwong

525538508140580865.text: "Can't you see it," he shouts, shaking his coworker by the collar, "The Official Xbox Magazine is just a MOUTHPIECE FOR BIG M!"
525538508140580865.name: fwong

525538225616478208.text: An aide runs in with photos. "These men attended the EA E3 party" His eyes narrow. "Kotaku editors... this is deeper than we thought."
525538225616478208.name: fwong

525537343529181184.text: INT. GGHQ -- NIGHT. A solitary fist slams on the table. "Impossible!" a lone freedom fighter shouts. "These CoD reviews are TOO GOOD!"
525537343529181184.name: fwong

525536818578468864.text: Anyway, the "anti corruption" part of GamerGate - got any corrupt gaming journalists fired for taking money from game publishahahaha
525536818578468864.name: fwong

525535299422531584.text: @MrDukeDumas @MrTrollham well gee, i suppose that might indicate there's a deeper problem with a big part of gamer culture being toxic huh
